mdRecord.dcterms:title: Faculty
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Faculty photo. Excerpt, front row (left to right): James M. Page, University President Edwin A. Alderman, William M. Thornton. Row 2: Milton W.Humphreys, Charles G. Maphis, Theodore Hugh, Richard H. Dabney, William M. Lyle, Raleigh C. Minor, John S. Davis, Charles A. Graves, William H. Echols, Francis P. Dunnington. Row 3: Robert M. Bird, Halsted S. Hedges, Thomas L. Watson, Albert LeFevre, William A. Lambeth, Richard H. Wilson, Stephen H. Watts, John L. Manahan. Row 4: Howard Winston, William H. Faulkner, Charles Hancock, Samuel A. Mitchell, John L. Newcomb, James C. Flippin, Harvey E. Jordan, George B. Eager, Ivey F. Lewis, Harry T. Marshall. Row 5: Isaac K. Moran, Charles W. Paul, James S. Wilson, Fiske Kimball, George O. Ferguson, Jr., Graham Edgar, Albert G.A. Balz, John C. Metcalf, William A. Kepner, Walter S. Rodman, James A. Waddell. Row 6: William D. Macon, Chapin Jones, Robert B. Bean, John J. Luck, Albert W. Giles, Tipton R. Snavely, William R. Warren, Wilfred Eldred, Herman P. Johnson, Caroll M. Sparrow, William H. Goodwin, Arthur Fickenshur. Row 7: William D. Macon, Charles H. Huffman, Gardner L. Carter, Francis H. Abbot, Ernest L. Lehman, James S. McMcKemore, Charles P. Oliner, W. Patton Graham, William E. Bray, Thomas F. Ball. back: Carl C. Speidel, John H. Yoe, Bruce S. Williams, William E. Knight, Harold L. Alden, Edward W. Saunders.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
